prepaid.name: Prepaid EVCs
prepaid.description: Lock in capacity with predictable budgeting and planning certainty. Ensures your strategic initiatives have dedicated resources while providing cost savings through our reserved capacity discount.

retroactive.name: Pay-as-you-go
retroactive.description: Maintain maximum financial flexibility with no upfront commitment. Ideal for uncertain transformation timelines or when allocating budget across multiple competing priorities.

intents.name: Strategic Discovery
intents.description: Define your challenges and create a strategic roadmap before scaling

intents.name: Visionary Growth
intents.description: Accelerate and scale your business to new heights

intents.name: Market Influence
intents.description: Build market perception and pricing power through strategic positioning

intents.name: Reinvention
intents.description: Pivot your business model for future sustainability

intents.name: Full Custom
intents.description: Tailored approach based on your unique business requirements

focused.label: Maximum depth on 1 strategic priority
focused.valueProposition: Concentrated impact with maximum efficiency per resource
focused.bestFor: Companies needing significant momentum on a single, critical priority or those with limited resources that cannot afford diluted effort

balanced.label: One strategic priority and 1-2 operational initiatives
balanced.valueProposition: Balanced progress across key channels with good efficiency
balanced.bestFor: Organizations with a clear strategic priority that also need to address operational necessities or complementary initiatives

distributed.label: 3-5 concurrent initiatives
distributed.valueProposition: Maximum reach across your entire business ecosystem
distributed.bestFor: Enterprises managing multiple strategic imperatives that must progress in parallel, with adequate resources to handle the coordination overhead

pathfinder.label: Pathfinder
pathfinder.valueProposition: Define your transformation journey with focused, steady progress

roadster.label: Roadster
roadster.description: Reliable delivery capacity for steady progress
roadster.valueProposition: Travel your transformation journey with reliability and momentum

jetpack.label: Jetpack
jetpack.valueProposition: Accelerate your growth with increased capacity

rocketship.label: Rocketship
rocketship.valueProposition: Transform your business at the highest possible speed

evcProducers.name: Data & Research
evcProducers.description: Market insights and specialized data access

serviceParameters.label: Premium Market Data
serviceParameters.description: Gain strategic advantage with proprietary market intelligence unavailable to competitors. Access insights about emerging opportunities and risks before they appear in public data.
serviceParameters.valueProposition: Strengthens market strategy with exclusive intelligence while identifying high-value opportunities ahead of competitors
serviceParameters.productionImpact: Improves quality and depth of strategic insights

serviceParameters.label: Account Concierge
serviceParameters.description: Eliminate coordination overhead and ensure high-level strategic alignment. Your dedicated executive liaison ensures transformation efforts remain connected to evolving business priorities.
serviceParameters.valueProposition: Streamlines executive oversight while accelerating decision-making processes for faster implementation

serviceParameters.label: Premium SLA
serviceParameters.description: Minimize business disruption with guaranteed response times for mission-critical operations. Includes 24/7 support for urgent issues that could impact business continuity.
serviceParameters.valueProposition: Significantly reduces transformation-related business disruptions, protecting revenue and customer experience
serviceParameters.productionImpact: Prioritizes your needs and ensures consistent service delivery

serviceParameters.label: On-site Presence
serviceParameters.description: For organizations that prefer or require in-person collaboration, our advisors can work directly at your location. While our standard approach includes remote delivery, we can accommodate on-premises requirements when needed for your specific environment.
serviceParameters.valueProposition: Supports organizations with security, regulatory, or organizational requirements for physical presence, though at additional cost due to travel and operational adjustments
serviceParameters.productionImpact: Increases resource commitment with higher costs but accommodates on-premises requirements

pillars.label: Discovery
pillars.tagline: Understand your current state and define success metrics
pillars.description: Comprehensive assessment and analysis of your current business situation to establish clear, measurable objectives for transformation.

pillars.label: Transformation
pillars.tagline: Implement solutions and drive organizational change
pillars.description: Executable strategies and frameworks that create fundamental shifts in how your organization operates, competes, and delivers value.

pillars.label: Strategy
pillars.description: Forward-looking approaches to position your business for sustainable growth and competitive advantage in evolving markets.

pillars.label: Technology
pillars.tagline: Leverage digital capabilities for business advantage
pillars.description: Practical application of technological solutions to overcome challenges, create efficiencies, and enable new business capabilities.

pillars.label: Catalyst
pillars.description: Short-form, high-leverage modules designed to unlock momentum, boost internal capability, or remove friction from your strategic execution. Catalysts are standalone offerings that amplify outcomes across any stage of your transformation journey.
